item.title: Send Emails from Flow without a Service Account
item.description: Want to send emails from Power Automate but can’t or don’t want to use a service account? Tired of dealing with Conditional Access Policies, password expirations, and frequent logins? Do you want a simple, secure, and scalable way to send emails without constantly re-confirming security information? Good news! In this guide, I’ll show you how to send emails directly from Microsoft Exchange using only an App Registration. No service accounts, no password headaches.
